sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app>
      <v-app-bar app color="primary" dark>
        <v-container>
          <v-row align="center" justify="space-between">
            <!-- Left side: Logo and Product Dropdown -->
            <v-col cols="auto">
              <v-toolbar-title>
                <v-img
                  src="../assets/logo.png"
                  max-width="120"
                  contain
                ></v-img>
              </v-toolbar-title>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="auto">
              <v-menu
                offset-y
                transition="slide-x-reverse-transition"
                :close-on-content-click="false"
              >
                <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
                  <v-btn v-bind="attrs" v-on="on" color="secondary">
                    Products
                    <v-icon right>mdi-menu-down</v-icon>
                  </v-btn>
                </template>
                <v-list>
                  <v-list-item>
                    <v-list-item-content>
                      <v-list-item-title>Electronics</v-list-item-title>
                    </v-list-item-content>
                  </v-list-item>
                  <v-list-item>
                    <v-list-item-content>
                      <v-list-item-title>Fashion</v-list-item-title>
                    </v-list-item-content>
                  </v-list-item>
                  <v-list-item>
                    <v-list-item-content>
                      <v-list-item-title>Home & Kitchen</v-list-item-title>
                    </v-list-item-content>
                  </v-list-item>
                  <v-list-item>
                    <v-list-item-content>
                      <v-list-item-title>Beauty & Health</v-list-item-title>
                    </v-list-item-content>
                  </v-list-item>
                </v-list>
              </v-menu>
            </v-col>
  
            <!-- Right side: Profile Img and Searchbar -->
            <v-col cols="auto" class="d-flex align-center">
              <v-text-field
                prepend-icon="mdi-magnify"
                label="Search products..."
                solo
                hide-details
                class="mr-4"
              ></v-text-field>
              <v-avatar size="40" class="ml-4">
                <v-img src="../assets/profile.jpg"></v-img>
              </v-avatar>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
        </v-container>
      </v-app-bar>
    </v-app>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    name: 'NavbarComponent',
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  /* Add any custom styling here */
  </style>
